title: Mystery Skins
body: Why is it the Mystery Skins Chest is only up for a short time then it is taken down, you are losing so much money, personally I won't be buying anything until it's back as i'm incredibly indecisive and will only purchase skins through Mystery Skin unless it's a skin I know I 200% love.

replies.body: Mystery Chests are only for special events, like Snowdown and Harrowing. If you want Mystery Skins outside of those events you'll have to trade Mystery Gifts with a friend. Those are always available.
I could have sworn that Mystery Chests have been available outside of an event before.
